name: semantic-release
description: Semantic Release commit format (strict Conventional Commits subset)
author: semantic-release team

validation.message: Must follow semantic-release format (feat, fix, perf, or revert only)

errorFormat:
Expected format: <type>(<scope>): <description>
Valid types for semantic versioning: feat, fix, perf, revert

Note: Only these types trigger releases.
Use other types (docs, chore, etc.) for non-release commits.

valid: feat: add new payment gateway integration
fix: prevent race condition in order processing
perf(database): optimize query for large datasets
invalid: docs: update README (use conventional strategy for non-release commits)
chore: update dependencies (not a release type)
